attributes.action: Leave or Remain.We were all misinformed & want a fair and new EU Referendum NOW!
attributes.additional_details: The results of the referendum to leave the EU have placed voters on both sides in a position of regret, post referendum realising some of the information provided by politicians & media in both camps was not accurate & therefore misguided them. Some voters placed a vote to make leaders listen & not realising that it could actually make a decisive impact.  Both voters feel let down by the manor in which both campaigns were run & as a result of all of this, we would like a new EU referendum NOW!
attributes.background: Whether leave or remain, the results of the EU referendum has unsettled us all. Both sides of the argument provided by politicians & media has now been realised to be exaggerated & over zealous.  Voters placed on both sides are reconsidering their votes & want the opportunity to vote again fairly.
